description: Researched and developed innovative solutions in the Digital Construction area.
Provided Agile coaching to teams, improving team performance and supporting health initiatives.
Focused on personal development and enhancing technical skills during this time.

Led the team responsible for delivering end-to-end products to new customers. Managed the Sprint Backlog, conducted regular meetings with Customer Care and Development teams, and implemented UX improvements.
Configured and delivered end-to-end products for new customers, provided customer service and troubleshooting, and monitored pricing through web scraping.
Trained customers and employees on Microsoft Power BI. Delivered business intelligence solutions for relational databases using SQL and Power BI.

Organized and managed the 3GCMEA international congress, delivered technical speeches in English, and managed finances as treasurer. Analyzed and designed microwave cavities as a consultant for international companies.
Developed front-end applications using HTML5, JavaScript, and CSS3. Managed relational databases to support project development.
